meanings.definition: A person who resides in a trailer.
meanings.sent1: The trailerites in our neighborhood are friendly and helpful.
meanings.sent2: Many trailerites enjoy the simplicity of living in a trailer.
meanings.sent3: The trailerites organized a community barbecue in the trailer park.
meanings.sent4: The trailerites are like modern-day nomads, moving from place to place.
meanings.sent5: I remember the trailerites waving from their colorful trailers as they passed by.

meanings.definition: A group of people who live in trailers.
meanings.sent1: Our community is a mix of homeowners and trailerites.
meanings.sent2: The trailerites gathered for a potluck dinner last night.
meanings.sent3: During the festival, the trailerites decorated their homes on wheels with lights.
meanings.sent4: The trailerites form a tight-knit community, always looking out for each other.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of the trailerites echoed through the trailer park on summer evenings.

meanings.definition: Belonging to or characteristic of those who live in trailers.
meanings.sent1: The trailerites lifestyle is simple and uncluttered.
meanings.sent2: She decorated her room with a trailerites theme, complete with camper decor.
meanings.sent3: The trailerites fashion show featured outfits inspired by trailer living.
meanings.sent4: The trailerites charm bracelet had tiny trailer charms hanging from it.
meanings.sent5: The trailerites community center was a hub of activity for all residents.
